description: Scrape a URL and extract its content in various formats using Firecrawl API.

api_key.info: The API key to use Firecrawl API.

timeout.info: Timeout in milliseconds for the scraping request.

scrapeOptions.info: Configuration for how the page is scraped (formats, onlyMainContent, includeTags, excludeTags, headers, etc.).

extractorOptions.info: Options for extracting specific data from the scraped content (schema, prompt, etc.).

errors.import_failed: Could not import firecrawl integration package. Please install it with `pip install firecrawl-py`.

logs.params_configured: Parameters configured - Formats: {formats}, Only main content: {only_main}
logs.app_initialized: Firecrawl app initialized with API key
logs.scrape_completed: Scrape completed successfully - Content length: {length} characters
